channel.title: Noble Maid Spy fails when converted to Aristocrat or Assassin
channel.description:
#### What happened? Used Maid Spy the same night that I was converted to aristocrat. I could not read whispers the next day, despite having no prevention or fail message. Same happened when I was promoted to assassin when using maid spy the same night.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Maid Spy's effect should carry over to the next class?
#### Steps to reproduce: 1. Use maid spy the same night your class changes due to conversion or promotion.
#### Comments: This may or may not be a bug depending on what the devs think should happen during conversion, but the interaction isn't mentioned anywhere in the game and is inconsistent with the conversion interactions with other classes' abilities.
